functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Tempest\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"The bow of Gishira the Storm Archer,","color":"gray"}','{"text":"who had faith in her people until the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"end, although they could not say the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"same for her.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Damage: 9","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Regeneration Delay: 1.7s","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Knockback I","color":"gray"}']},Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:7,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:knockback",lvl:1}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"generic.attackSpeed",Operation:0,Amount:1020,UUIDLeast:9849379,UUIDMost:92788,Slot:"mainhand"}],HoldingID:48}
